message: The Solar Red HTC U11 brings sunset vibes like you've never seen before. ☀️

Blue is bold. With the Sapphire Blue HTC U11, you're phone won't be confused with the ordinary.

The beautifully reflective Amazing Silver is truly captivating. Inspired by the playfulness of light as it hits the rippled surface of the sea, the new HTC color has depth like you have never seen before.
Great moments won't wait for perfect lighting. Capture better photos even in low light situations with the HTC U11. #ShotonHTC

Ice White brings a level of class and sophistication to your phone. The white shimmers with flecks of gold and shades of rose as it moves in the light. It’s like having a phone covered in pearls. #HTCU11
Grabbing some couch time this weekend with the newest member of the family. #HTCU11
The Brilliant Black is like staring into a mysterious night sky with deep shades of green and purple. The impeccable quality and beautiful reflective surface give this color a truly premium feel.
We're continuing to expand what Edge Sense on the HTC U11 is capable of — take an early look at what's on the roadmap.
The opulence of Sapphire Blue is sure to impress. This stand-out color shines brilliantly in the light and has tones of rich blues and purples inspired by a decadent sapphire gemstone.
With the Solar Red HTC U11, don't be surprised when you get a bit more attention.
Our final Meet U event brought us to Los Angeles where fans got a look at the HTC U11 on the eve of it's release. Can you feel their excitement?
Solar Red embodies the strength and majesty of the sun. The deep reds change in the light and transform to shimmering golds and yellows. A color like this can only be made in the heavens. #HTCU11
Solar Red HTC U11 — a different shade in every light.
You want it, you got it! The Solar Red HTC U11 will now be coming to more countries around the globe!

The Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processor in the HTC U11 packs a punch, giving you the breathtaking speed, jaw-dropping graphics, smooth performance and longer battery life you need every day.
We had a great time meeting fans in San Francisco & showing off our newest flagship. If you're rocking the HTC U11, what are your first impressions so far?
Want to capture the audio of a specific subject while recording video on HTC U11? Just zoom in to activate Acoustic Focus. Yup, it's that simple with the HTC U11.

With the Sapphire Blue HTC U11, even when you're wearing all black you'll still stand out.

Life is tough but with Sense Companion on the HTC U11, it just got easier. That's because Sense Companion gets to know you and your patterns in order to provide you with tips and information to help get you through your day.
